title: [Android] Copy so.
body: Use a dedicated way to copy unstripped `.so` file without the importable file path.

milestone.title: Weex 0.26
milestone.description:
As every Weex release needs approval from PPMC(*Podling Project Management Committee*) and IPMC(*Incubator Project Management Committee*), the due date only implies the coding deadline, not the release date.

Normally, it takes two or three week to publish a release after the coding deadline.

title: [Android] Check weexVersion
body:
1. The version must have 4 sections like `0.20.0.1`
2. The leading three section must be number, and the last section is odd number with or without suffix string.
3. Version check can be ignored by `-PignoreVersionCheck=true`

title: [Android] Add weex-rax-api.js for eagle
body:
1. Add weex-rax-api.js for all eagle page
2. If it is `eagle` and `Vue`, set the value of `weex-rax-api.js` to `\0`
3. Change the json structure of `weex.config.env`.

* Before
  * Normal Page

        {
            "bundleType": "Vue",
            "bundleUrl": "xxxx",
            "env": {
                "deviceHeight": "1200",
                "deviceWidth": "720",
                "enableBackupThread": "true",
                "enableBackupThreadCache": "true",
                .....
            },
            "render_strategy": "DATA_RENDER"
        }

  * Eagle Page
    As bundleType is `Others`, `env.options` will not be merged into `env`.

        {
            "bundleType": "Others",
            "bundleUrl": "xxxx",
            "env": {
                "deviceHeight": "1200",
                "deviceWidth": "720",
                "options": {
                    "enableBackupThread": "true",
                    "enableBackupThreadCache": "true",
                    .....
                }
                ....
            },
            "render_strategy": "DATA_RENDER"
        }

* After
  1. No matter what bundleType, always merge `env.options` into `env`
  1. For compatibility reason, remain the `env.options` at its original place.

            {
                "bundleType": "Other",
                "bundleUrl": "xxxx",
                "env": {
                    "deviceHeight": "1200",
                    "deviceWidth": "720",
                    "enableBackupThread": "true",
                    "enableBackupThreadCache": "true",
                    "options": {
                        "enableBackupThread": "true",
                        "enableBackupThreadCache": "true",
                        .....
                    }
                    .....
                },
                "render_strategy": "DATA_RENDER"
            }

title: [core] fix flex-end in row-reverse
body:
We fount that, when flex-direction is row-reverse, justify-content:flex-end is not available, not matter justify-content is flex-start or flex-end, layout system always layout items as flex-start.

Demo:
https://jsplayground.taobao.org/raxplayground/a3ad1d37-a6b7-41bb-9b72-3c00ab4ee161

title: * [Android] Fix android playground run unexpectedly on arm-v7a platform
body: Remove armABIOnly flag, which will cause 32 bits so and 64 bits cross link problem.

title: * [Android] Add weex-main-jsfrm.js and weex-rax-api.js to gitignore
body: Add weex-main-jsfrm.js and weex-rax-api.js to gitignore, as they are copied from `prebuild/` directory now.

title: [iOS] fix compile error when weexsdk used by other app
* [Android] Update build.gradle
body:
1. Init `disableCov` in a more decent way.
1. Invoke `item.delete` in execution stage instead of calling project. delete in configuration stage, which is due to `delete` is a function under `Project` object when facing closure.

title: [iOS] fix richtext show error on eagle
[iOS] fix richtext show error on eagle
* [Android] Update build.gradle
body: Delete libweexcore.so and libweexjss.so only if transformNativeLibsWithStripDebugSymbolForRelease is triggered.
